title: Quran-Burning Protest: Is Sweden's NATO Bid in Trouble? | Vantage with Palki Sharma
selftext: Sweden has granted a 37-year-old man permission to burn the Quran outside Stockholm mosque.
comments: Have to wonder what uproar would erupt from Godi Media if a Hindu religious text was burned. Of course no one will dare to burn a quran in India
